title: DJ Pascoe's Top 10 Tunes 2 - The best tracks from 101 of the hottest pop stars
description: Top 10 Tunes 2 is DJ Pascoe's selection of smash hits, from the veterans of 'old school' to icons of the modern age. They may be from different eras, but they all have one thing in common: their ability to produce music that gets people to tear up the dancefloor. As with his first book, which received high praise and critical acclaim from music enthusiasts to professional DJs, this new publication features exactly what it says in the title.
author: Pascoe Sawyers
